Detailed Description

3d Camera.

Camera uses UVN-model. Control camera by setting it's position and target point.

Member Function Documentation

void Follow (  const Vector3fx &  pos_,
const Vector3fx &  target_,
const Vector3fx &  vWorldUp_,
const Fixed &  factor_
) 
 

Moves camera to destination position and target point from current state.

Parameters:
pos_ - destination position.
target_ - destination target point.
vWorldUp_ - default "Up" vector for calculating U,V,N vectors.
factor_ - approaching factor (in interval from 0.0 to 1.0). Used for smooth moving.

Initializes camera.

Moves camera between two positions and directions.

Parameters:
pos1_ - source position.
target1_ - source target point.
vWorldUp1_ - source "Up" vector.
pos2_ - destination position.
target2_ - destination target point.
vWorldUp2_ - destination "Up" vector.
msec_ - time interval for moving.
